short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI that reads and explains complex code naturally, like a human Denigma explains code in conversational English.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Denigma uses machine learning to explain code. Denigma explains concepts and business logic. You can use Denigma to onboard faster, fix bugs in large codebases, and review code.
